The Worker's ship touches down on Earth. He climbs out and looks around. Th=
is seemed to be millions of years in the past. The Worker smiled. No opposi=
tion, and he could cause whole races to go extinct. He wanders off, detecti=
ng some energy sigantures but not paying any attention to them. He laughed =
about how he won the war single handedly and brought the Autobots to their =
knees begging, even though in reality, he never did such a thing...
